issue.title: BDI single-step fails when orientation not close to zero

content.raw: I personally would like to have this patch merged, but besides our own testing with good results, we've only heard back concerns from one team in the pull request advising against merging, so it has not been merged.  And at this point, we need A LOT of motivation for merging additional changes.
content.html: I personally would like to have this patch merged, but besides our own testing with good results, we've only heard back concerns from one team in the pull request advising against merging, so it has not been merged.
